title: Just the Tip: How to Succeed in the Dating Game
itunes:title: Just the Tip: How to Succeed in the Dating Game
itunes:subtitle: In today’s Podcast, Emily and Anderson are teaming up to help you succeed in the dating game, and satisfy your sexual needs! They answer listener emails, cover some of the do’s and don’ts of dating, and address some common dating...
description:
In today’s Podcast, Emily and Anderson are teaming up to help you succeed in the dating game, and satisfy your sexual needs! They answer listener emails, cover some of the do’s and don’ts of dating, and address some common dating misconceptions.

Before they jump into some sex in the news, Emily has some news of her own. She’s ready to take her own advice and jump back into dating, which means you can look forward to more tales from the Emily dating files. Speaking of which, Emily recounts her most recent (and completely bizarre) blind date experience, which leads her to some key advice for what NOT to do on a date.

This Podcast answers some major dating questions: How important are looks, really? How do you impress the ladies? And what state has the best potential for finding you next hookup? They’ve got the tips, and then some.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
